name: Love Cat Radio Shack
description:
Love Cat Radio Shack is a groovy rhythm game featuring 'The Lovecats' by The Cure. 

Instructions:

-Hit the notes in time with the song. 
-Notes come from both sides of the screen. 
-To hit a note press the correct button when it passes through the middle.
-WASD is used for the up, left, down, and right blue notes.
-IJKL is used for the up, left, down, and right orange notes. 

See if you can get a purrfect score! 

Made by:

Joni Lev - @JoniTweetsGames

Fynn Levy - @FakeFrogsOnly

Menu music is 'Bu-Good (Bad?) Days' by Masayoshi Takanaka.

Please note: There appears to sometimes be an issue with the game's scoring system caused by Unity's web player.
